MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:22pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the local substation. And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:40 PM on Thursday, 25 March 2021.
